workflow.name: Cohesity - Push Ransomware Alerts to SecureX
workflow.title: Cohesity - Push Ransomware Alerts to SecureX

properties.name: Number of Hours
properties.description: Specifies how many hours ago alerts will be fetched from. For example, if you set this to 1,000, all alerts from the past 1,000 hours will be fetched. By default it is set to 720 hours (30 days)
This workflow pushes Cohesity Helios ransomware alerts to SecureX Threat Response incidents with matching sightings.
properties.display_name: Cohesity - Push Ransomware Alerts to SecureX

properties.script:
import argparse, ast
import json

parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
parser.add_argument("property_list", help="")
args = parser.parse_args()

# Get property dict
property_list = json.loads(args.property_list)
property_dict = {}
for property_item in property_list:
    property_dict[property_item['key']] = property_item['value']

external_id = property_dict.get('object', '') + '___' + \
                property_dict.get('entityId', '') + '___' + \
                property_dict.get('source', '') + '___' + \
                property_dict.get('cluster', '') + '___' + \
                property_dict.get('cid', '')
